reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. BATES v. WIMBERLY, 493 So.2d 631 (La. 1986)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. OTIS BATES, JR. v. HON. JUDGE WIMBERLY, CRIMINAL

opinion.posture: In re Bates, Otis Jr.; applying for writ of mandamus; Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court, Div. "I", No. 279-008.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Denied. Record does not support claim new trial was granted.
